title: Foreign Charge Declaration
description: Foreign charge declaration definition based on IATA electronic Air Waybill.

foreignCurrencyConvertionRate.title: Currency Conversion Rate
foreignCurrencyConvertionRate.description: The foreign currency code followed by the conversion rate shall be inserted. Box 33A.

foreignChargesCurrency.title: Charges in foreign Currency
foreignChargesCurrency.description: The amount shown in the "Total Collect" box shall be inserted after conversion to the foreign currency. Box 33B.

foreignCharges.title: Foreign charges
foreignCharges.description: Charges levied at destination accruing to the last carrier shall be inserted in destination currency. Box 33C.
